messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] trouble with yahoo?
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Hema A. Bharadwaj  Hello! Been trying to send a response to the group since this morning. does anyone know if there is a yahoo
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Hema A. Bharadwaj <hbonda@...>


Hello!
Been trying to send a response to the group since this morning. does
anyone
know if there is a yahoo problem? i cna't see my messages in the yahoo
group page.

Since i use gmail.... i first tried sending it from there but then i
went
and logged onto the yahoo page and still the message won't show up in
the
new messages.

-=-=-=-

Sometimes posts get hijacked and float around in cyberspace for a few
days---who knows why. I just lost a series of posts that finally showed
up two days later.

But *your* posts were waiting in the moderator's file here at the
group. We moderate new members' posts for a while until we're sure they
aren't spammers or trolls---or just writing posts meant to incite or
anger.

Because the owners and moderators *do* have lives outside this list
<g>, we don't always get to them immediately. Mostly we *do*---with
four of us, usually someone comes in, reads, and clicks quite
regularly---often *just* after you post, so you may never know you're
on moderation (but all newbies *are* unless we know you from a
different list). But occasionally, we're all asleep or cooking supper
or playing in the yard or out of town. Then it takes a while longer to
show up. But we get to it as fast as we can! <g>


~Kelly


**************************************
See what's new at http://www.aol.com
